description.value: Character is marked by the Blood God upon their soul and possibly their body. They are driven to forever spill blood in the name of Khorne. The Character gains Resistance (Psychic Powers), Brutal Charge, and Unnatural Strength(+2), the Mark itself also may be required for some other abilities. Leaving the path of Khorne will now trigger their retribution, doing so loses this talent and forces two rolls on the Gifts of the Gods table, choosing the worse result.
